text: MindChamps was the best choice l’ve made for my daughter. Teachers and staff are amazing and they support us in any way. They organize special events in which parents and children can create beautiful memories such as Mother’s Day celebration! My daughter is always happy to go to school and this means a lot! Thank you!!!
appreciate how much thought and effort the centre puts into every celebration. teachers always make the atmosphere lively. my child loves going to school and we’re really happy with the curriculum

Both my children have been in this centre since infant care. My first one has graduated from the centre and the second one will be soon. The main reason why I stayed at the centre was because the teachers at the centre are caring and accommodating. They felt like family and I never felt worried as I knew they were in good hands ❤️ we will miss dropping our kids off here next year!
Wonderful preschool! DS has a great time here and we trust the school in terms of safety and nutrition. Excellent teachers. A variety of programs and a very special music program!
This is very nice preschool, patient and friendly teachers and staffs. We are very glad and honor to join in the BV Champs family.
